module.title: bho
module.p: bho is a preposition meaning from.
Some temporal uses of bho are –

ol.li: In the adverb of frequency bho àm gu àm from time to time, occasionally – bho àm gu àm rachadh e dhan bhaile mhòr from time to time he would go to the city

box.title: bhon + N
box.p: Modifies a verb denoting a state or activity (imperfective). Denotes the starting point, initial boundary.
since – context implies that the state/activity is still ongoing at the reference time
